subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Édgar Rentería went 5 for 5 with a home run and drove in two runs to lead the Atlanta Braves to a 6-2 victory against the host Cleveland Indians yesterday.
snippet: Édgar Rentería went 5 for 5 with a home run and drove in two runs to lead the Atlanta Braves to a 6-2 victory against the host Cleveland Indians yesterday.
